p: Other studies in Ukraine have considered the HIV cascade of care and prevalence trends. An analysis of 2015 IBBS data among HIV‐positive PWID also found evidence that NGO‐status was positively associated with self‐reported registration at an AIDS centre and receiving ART [ 22]. Otherwise, a study from 2011 to 2014 using intervention monitoring and evaluation data found that harm reduction coverage (receiving more syringes and condoms) was associated with decreased HIV acquisition risk [ 23], adding to our findings that harm reduction coverage is linked to improvements in risk behaviours and coverage of OAT and ART.
